dt-example.title: Restrict Filtering to Certain Columns
dt-example.info:
This example demonstrates the behaviour of SearchBuilder when the `-init searchBuilder.columns` is set to limit which columns can be filtered on. It is an array of the type `-type column-selector`, allowing a wide range of different ways of selecting columns.
Notice in this example that the "Data" `-tag select` element only has 3 columns to choose from.
